explanation: [0-0] A man wearing glasses with green frames appears in the shot, showing half of his face. He is holding a yellow sponge with foam towards the camera. The background is a blurred pink wall with photos.

[0-3] The video begins with the man squeezing the sponge forcefully, soapy water oozing out from between his fingers. He then places the sponge flat on his palm, pours chocolate sauce on it, and sprinkles colorful sugar sprinkles, making it look like a piece of chocolate cake.

[0-3] The video begins with the man squeezing the sponge forcefully, soapy water oozing out from between his fingers. He then places the sponge flat on his palm, pours chocolate sauce on it, and sprinkles colorful sugar sprinkles, making it look like a piece of chocolate cake.

[0-3] The video begins with the man squeezing the sponge forcefully, soapy water oozing out from between his fingers. He then places the sponge flat on his palm, pours chocolate sauce on it, and sprinkles colorful sugar sprinkles, making it look like a piece of chocolate cake.

[3-6] Then, the scene switches to a man in bright sportswear, smiling and sitting at a yellow table. There is a chocolate cake on a white plate on the table. He is set against a yellow-green background. He takes another identical chocolate cake and puts it on the plate, then picks up the plate and walks away.

[3-6] Then, the scene switches to a man in bright sportswear, smiling and sitting at a yellow table. There is a chocolate cake on a white plate on the table. He is set against a yellow-green background. He takes another identical chocolate cake and puts it on the plate, then picks up the plate and walks away.

He is set against a yellow-green background. He takes another identical chocolate cake and puts it on the plate, then picks up the plate and walks away.

[6-9] Next, the scene switches again, and the man sits down on the sofa with the plate. He is wearing ripped green trousers. A woman with pink and blue hair is sitting on the yellow sofa. She is wearing a white top and blue trousers and is holding a pink five-pointed star doll. On the pink wall behind them hang two pictures. The man and woman are talking. The man lets the woman try the chocolate cake.

[9-17] Subsequently, the camera zooms in on the woman as she is about to pick up a piece of cake from the plate. She looks up at the man and gestures with her hand to refuse. She then reaches for the other piece of cake and takes a bite. With a painful expression, she puts down the cake, picks up the other piece again, takes a bite, and spits it out. Her expression becomes more painful, and she covers her mouth with her hand, looking very uncomfortable.
